scripts.build: pnpm build:tools && pnpm run build:api:package:constant && pnpm run build:api:package:types
scripts.build:tools: cd ../../ && cp -a firebase.json ./tools/development-tools/src/utils/ && cd tools/development-tools && tsc
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && concurrently -n 'DEV:WEBHOOKS,DEV:CRON,BUILD:API,API,PACKAGE:CONSTANTS:BUILD,PACKAGE:UTILITIES:BUILD,PACKAGE:TYPES:WATCH,PACKAGE:CONSTANT:WATCH' 'sleep 30 && pnpm run init:config:dev && op run --no-masking --env-file='.env' -- pnpm run webhooks' 'sleep  && op run --no-masking --env-file='.env' -- pnpm run cron' 'cd ../../apps/api.movetcare.com && pnpm run watch' 'pnpm run watch' 'cd ../../packages/constant && pnpm run watch' 'cd ../../packages/utilities && pnpm run watch' 'pnpm run watch:package:type' 'pnpm run watch:package:constant'
